title: Is it always right to be right?
creator_credit: Lee Mishkin, Nick Bosustow and Stephen Bosustow Productions

video_links.name: Is it always right to be right?

brief_description: This fast moving parable, designed to provoke discussion without alienating any group, highlights the centres of divisiveness in our society, the generation gap, poverty, war and race. It tells of a land “where men were always right”. This animated film is a winner of many awards including an Academy Award. Narrated by Orson Welles.
